We provide a detailed breakdown of all associated costs upfront ensuring complete transparency and no unexpected financial surprises during the transaction.

faqs.question: Are there any restrictions on construction height or design in Sector 62 plots
faqs.answer: Yes construction rules in Sector 62 Gurugram are governed by the Haryana Urban Development Authority HUDA or DTCP Department of Town and Country Planning guidelines depending on the specific colony status. Typically there are restrictions on the maximum number of floors allowed often restricted to Stilt plus Four Floors and the maximum height permitted. Additionally there are mandated setback requirements front rear and side that dictate how much of the plot can be covered. Always consult the approved zoning plan and FSI regulations for your specific plot before finalizing architectural drawings.
